title: Compatible with your favorite tools
description: Hashguard seamlessly integrates with your existing digital ecosystem.

items.name: Microsoft Office
items.description: Edit and collaborate on Office documents directly from Hashguard, with automatic and secure synchronization.

items.name: Google Workspace
items.description: Import and secure your Google documents with our integration plugin, while keeping collaboration easy.

items.name: Slack
items.description: Share secure files directly in your Slack conversations without compromising data protection.

items.name: Open API
items.description: Integrate Hashguard with any application using our complete REST API and detailed documentation.
